description: Training Support Services to Support Department of National Defence (DND)
tags: Transfert * Services de soutien à la formation
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Description of the Service Required

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a provider of academic and developmental support, clerical support, training support, instructional support, and courseware development in relation to Canadian Armed Forces training courses provided through Canadian Defence Academy (CDA) and Military Personnel Generation Group (MPGG).

## Period of Contract

The contract will be for a period of one year from the date of contract award, with an option to extend the term for an additional one-year period.

## Procurement Details

* **Tender reference number:** W4938-23001S
* **Solicitation number:** WS4445973743
* **Date of publication:** 2024-02-28
* **Closing time:** 2024-03-18 at 14:00 EDT

## Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Regions of Delivery

The services must be delivered to primary locations in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region) and Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region).

## Contact Information

For any queries or concerns, please contact:

* Andrew Denbeigh, Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
